sentence: State Sen. Doug Mastriano was reportedly invited, but attempts to reach his team were unsuccessful.
title: Pennsylvania Republicans to Trump: Notice me

sentence: This isnt the only race with a high profile GOP candidate though could do more harm than good to the GOPs chances in November: Democrat Josh Shapiro wants Doug Mastriano to win the Pennsylvania Republican primary for governor on May 17.
title: LOL! Watch Members Of The MAGA Crowd Boo Dr. Oz (R. NJ) At Trump Rally
